languages.text: "Но вот если есть способ дверку мою не захлопнуть наглухо, а так прикрыть, чтобы лишь маленькая щелочка осталась... Это уже разговор другой. Я шкурой чую, что если найдем эту штуку, чем бы они ни была, то все получится!"

traits.locale_text: "Но вот если есть способ дверку мою не захлопнуть наглухо, а так прикрыть, чтобы лишь маленькая щелочка осталась... Это уже разговор другой. Я шкурой чую, что если найдем эту штуку, чем бы они ни была, то все получится!"

languages.text: "But if there's a way — no, not to shut my door completely, but to make it so a tiny little crack remains... now that's a different story. I can just feel it: if we find this thing, whatever it is, it'll all be all right!"
languages.original_text: "Но вот если есть способ дверку мою не захлопнуть наглухо, а так прикрыть, чтобы лишь маленькая щелочка осталась... Это уже разговор другой. Я шкурой чую, что если найдем эту штуку, чем бы они ни была, то все получится!"

traits.locale_text: "But if there's a way — no, not to shut my door completely, but to make it so just a tiny little crack remains... now that's a different story. I can just feel it: if we find that thing, whatever it is, it'll all be all right!"

"But if there's a way — no, not to shut my door completely, but to make it so just a tiny little crack remains... now that's a different story. I can just feel it: if we find that thing, whatever it is, it'll all be all right!"

"But if there's a way — no, not to shut my door completely, but to make it so a tiny little crack remains... now that's a different story. I can just feel it: if we find this thing, whatever it is, it'll all be all right!"

"But if there's a way — no, not to shut my door completely, but to make it so a tiny little crack remains... now that's a different story. I can just feel it: if we find this thing, whatever it is, it'll all be all right!"

"But if there's a way — no, not to shut my door completely, but to make it so a tiny little crack remains... now that's a different story. I can just feel it: if we find this thing, whatever it is, it'll all be all right!"

languages.text: “不过，如果能有办法，不完全把我脑中的门关上，而是只留一条小小的裂缝……那就是另一回事了。我有种感觉，虽然不知道我们到底要找什么东西，但只要找到了这个东西，一切都会好起来！”
languages.original_text: "But if there's a way — no, not to shut my door completely, but to make it so a tiny little crack remains... now that's a different story. I can just feel it: if we find this thing, whatever it is, it'll all be all right!"

traits.locale_text: “不过，如果能有办法，不完全把我脑中的门关上，而是只留一条小小的裂缝……那就是另一回事了。我有种感觉，虽然不知道我们到底要找什么东西，但只要找到了这个东西，一切都会好起来！”

languages.text: «Pero si hay una forma... no de cerrar mi puerta por completo, pero sí de hacer que solo quede una rendijita... esa es otra historia. Lo presiento: ¡si encontramos esto, sea lo que sea, todo irá bien!».
languages.original_text: "But if there's a way — no, not to shut my door completely, but to make it so a tiny little crack remains... now that's a different story. I can just feel it: if we find this thing, whatever it is, it'll all be all right!"

traits.locale_text: «Pero si hay una forma... no de cerrar mi puerta por completo, pero sí de hacer que solo quede una rendijita... esa es otra historia. Lo presiento: ¡si encontramos esto, sea lo que sea, todo irá bien!».

languages.text: "Aber wenn es einen Weg gibt — nein, nicht meine Tür vollständig zu schließen, aber doch so weit, dass sie nur noch einen kleinen Spalt aufsteht ... nun, dann ist das eine andere Sache. Ich spüre es einfach. Wenn wir dieses Ding finden, was es auch ist, dann wird alles gut!"
languages.original_text: "But if there's a way — no, not to shut my door completely, but to make it so a tiny little crack remains... now that's a different story. I can just feel it: if we find this thing, whatever it is, it'll all be all right!"

traits.locale_text: "Aber wenn es einen Weg gibt — nein, nicht meine Tür vollständig zu schließen, aber doch so weit, dass sie nur noch einen kleinen Spalt aufsteht ... nun, dann ist das eine andere Sache. Ich spüre es einfach. Wenn wir dieses Ding finden, was es auch ist, dann wird alles gut!"

languages.text: 「でも、もし何か方法があれば…そう、扉を完全に閉めるのではなくて、小さなひびが残るようにする方法があれば......話は別ね。私には分かるわ。もし見つけることができれば、それが何であれ、すべてうまくいく！」。
languages.original_text: "But if there's a way — no, not to shut my door completely, but to make it so a tiny little crack remains... now that's a different story. I can just feel it: if we find this thing, whatever it is, it'll all be all right!"

traits.locale_text: 「でも、もし何か方法があれば…そう、扉を完全に閉めるのではなくて、小さなひびが残るようにする方法があれば......話は別ね。私には分かるわ。もし見つけることができれば、それが何であれ、すべてうまくいく！」。

languages.text: « Mais s'il y a un moyen... non pas de fermer définitivement ma porte, mais de la laisser juste entrebâillée... voilà qui changerait la donne. Si nous trouvons cette chose, quoi qu'elle puisse être, je sens que tout rentrera dans l'ordre ! »
languages.original_text: "But if there's a way — no, not to shut my door completely, but to make it so a tiny little crack remains... now that's a different story. I can just feel it: if we find this thing, whatever it is, it'll all be all right!"

traits.locale_text: « Mais s'il y a un moyen... non pas de fermer définitivement ma porte, mais de la laisser juste entrebâillée... voilà qui changerait la donne. Si nous trouvons cette chose, quoi qu'elle puisse être, je sens que tout rentrera dans l'ordre ! »

languages.text: "Eğer bir yolu varsa... Kapımı tamamen kapatmanın değil ama çok az bir aralık kalacak kadar örtmenin bir yolu yani... O zaman işler değişir. Hissediyorum, bu şey her neyse onu bulursak iyi olacağım!"
languages.original_text: "But if there's a way — no, not to shut my door completely, but to make it so a tiny little crack remains... now that's a different story. I can just feel it: if we find this thing, whatever it is, it'll all be all right!"

traits.locale_text: "Eğer bir yolu varsa... Kapımı tamamen kapatmanın değil ama çok az bir aralık kalacak kadar örtmenin bir yolu yani... O zaman işler değişir. Hissediyorum, bu şey her neyse onu bulursak iyi olacağım!"
